parts.1:
<=21-- LANGUAGE GLOBAL VARIABLE=20 Default is EN To pull language code from field in Unica file use setglobalvars(LANGUAGE,l= ookup(GENERIC05)) To pull language code from CELL_CODE use setglobalvars(LANGUAGE,cond(eq(loo= kup(CELL_CODE),ET01),CH,cond(eq(lookup(CELL_CODE),ET02),DE,cond(eq(lookup(C= ELL_CODE),ET03),EN,cond(eq(lookup(CELL_CODE),ET04),ES,cond(eq(lookup(CELL_C= ODE),ET05),FR,cond(eq(lookup(CELL_CODE),ET06),JA,cond(eq(lookup(CELL_CODE),= ET07),PT,cond(eq(lookup(CELL_CODE),ET08),KO,cond(eq(lookup(CELL_CODE),ET09)= ,TCH,EN))))))))),EN) To pull language code from Master Contacts List use setglobalvars(LANGUAGE,= lookup(LANG_CD)) --> <=21-- OPT GLOBAL VARIABLE=20 Default is OPT_TYPE from Unica file For MileagePlus ADMN/NONM campaigns use setglobalvars(OPT,MPPR) For United ADMN/NONM campaigns use setglobalvars(OPT,UADL) You will need to change the From and Reply To fields on the Campaign Dashbo= ard --> <=21-- COUNTRY GLOBAL VARIABLE=20 Default is COUNTRY_ from the Master Contacts List For ADMN campaigns use setglobalvars(COUNTRY,lookup(ISO_CNTRY_CD)) For NONM campaigns use setglobalvars(COUNTRY,US) or whichever country is appropriate --> <=21-- MEMBER_LEVEL GLOBAL VARIABLE=20 Default is ELITE_LEVEL from the Master Contacts List For ADMN campaigns use setglobalvars(MEMBER_LEVEL,lookup(MP_PGM_MBRSP_LVL_C= D)) For NONM campaigns use setglobalvars(MEMBER_LEVEL,0) or whichever member level is appropriate --> <=21-- POS GLOBAL VARIABLE=20 This variable is passed to the POS=3D attribute in the link table --> <=21-- SECOND LANGUAGE GLOBAL VARIABLE=20 Used by Language Toggle Default is EN To set second language by CELL_CODE use setglobalvars(SCND_LANG,cond(lookup(LANG_TOGGLE_INDICATOR),select(lookup(CE= LL_CODE),ET01,CH,ET02,DE,ET03,EN,ET04,ES,ET05,FR,ET06,JA,ET07,PT,ET08,KO,ET= 09,TCH),nothing())) -->

&=23160;
=20 <=21-- Body Copy=2E -->Your United MileagePlu= s® Explorer Card provides a free first standard checked bag* for you (t= he primary Cardmember) and one companion on United®-operated flights &m= dash; a savings of up to =24100 per roundtrip=2E
 
As a reminder, to receive this benefit you ne= ed to:
 
=20 <=21-- Begin Bulleted List --> =20
• Include your MileagePlus number in your reservation
 
• Purchase your ticket(s) with your Explorer Card
=20 <=21-- Ended Bulleted List --> =20
 
See more details
=
 
 
<=21-- End modules -->
 
 
 
  
 
MileagePlus Cards by Chase
 
 
 
=
 
<=21-- Begin Social Media --> =20
Stay connected to United
= = =
<=21-- End Social Media -->
 
&n= bsp;
=20 <=21-- /Hero Module -->=20 <=21-- margin --> =20

Terms and= conditions:
*FREE CHECKED BAG: The primary Cardmember and one traveling companion on th= e same reservation are each eligible to receive their first standard checke= d bag free; authorized users are only eligible if they are on the same rese= rvation as the primary Cardmember=2E To receive first standard checked bag = free, the primary Cardmember must include their MileagePlus® number in = their reservation and use their MileagePlus Explorer Card to purchase their= ticket(s)=2E First standard checked bag free is only available on United&r= eg;- and United Express®-operated flights; codeshare partner-operated f= lights are not eligible=2E Service charges for oversized, overweight and ex= tra baggage may apply=2E Cardmembers who are already exempt from other chec= ked baggage service charges will not receive an additional free standard ch= ecked bag=2E Chase is not responsible for the provision of, or failure to p= rovide, the stated benefits=2E Please visit united=2Ecom/chasebag for details=2E

MileagePlus terms and conditions:
Miles accrued, awards, and benefits issued are subject to change and are su= bject to the rules of the United MileagePlus program, including without lim= itation the Premier® program (the =22MileagePlus Program=22), which are= expressly incorporated herein=2E Please allow 6–8 weeks after comple= ted qualifying activity for miles to post to your account=2E United may cha= nge the MileagePlus Program including, but not limited to, rules, regulatio= ns, travel awards and special offers or terminate the MileagePlus Program a= t any time and without notice=2E United and its subsidiaries, affiliates an= d agents are not responsible for any products or services of other particip= ating companies and partners=2E Taxes and fees related to award travel are = the responsibility of the member=2E Bonus award miles, award miles and any = other miles earned through non-flight activity do not count toward qualific= ation for Premier status unless expressly stated otherwise=2E The accumulat= ion of mileage or Premier status or any other status does not entitle membe= rs to any vested rights with respect to the MileagePlus Program=2E All calc= ulations made in connection with the MileagePlus Program, including without= limitation with respect to the accumulation of mileage and the satisfactio= n of the qualification requirements for Premier status, will be made by Uni= ted Airlines and MileagePlus in their discretion and such calculations will= be considered final=2E Information in this communication that relates to t= he MileagePlus Program does not purport to be complete or comprehensive and= may not include all of the information that a member may believe is import= ant, and is qualified in its entirety by reference to all of the informatio= n on the united=2Ecom we= bsite and the MileagePlus Program rules=2E United and MileagePlus are regis= tered service marks=2E For complete details about the MileagePlus Program, = go to united=2Ecom=2E
See= additional MileagePlus terms and conditions

C000013567 14342 ET06
=20 <=21--/legal -->=20 <=21-- margin -->
<=21--/margin -->=20 <=21-- footer -->=20 =20 <=21-- footer -->
Don't miss the latest emails; add =40news=2Eunited=2Ecom
You have received this email because it includes important information rega= rding your MileagePlus Credit Card benefits=2E Your privacy and email prefe= rences are very important to us=2E If you previously opted not to receive p= romotional emails from MileagePlus, we will continue to respect your prefer= ences=2E However, we will continue to send you non-promotional, service ema= ils concerning your account, the MileagePlus program or United=2E
 
This email was sent to christine=40spang=2Ecc
 
Please do not reply to this email=2E We cannot accept electronic replies to= this email address=2E

900 Grand Plaza Dr=2E
Houston, TX 77067
